document_data.name: Maerilee Goodfellow
document_data.mainbody: '''Maerilee Goodfellow''' was a maid for [[Mirt]] in the mid-14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Description: Maerilee's back was criscrossed with white and purple scars.
document_data.Activities: Maerilee became a maid for [[Mirt]] in [[Waterdeep]].
document_data.History: At some point prior to {{yearlink|1357}}, Maerilee Goodfellow was a pirate's slave in the [[Nelanther]] isles. After catching Mirt's eye, he paid for her release, whereupon she became his maid. On 1357, she briefly showed her back scars to [[Paraster Montheir]] on Asper's command.
document_data.Rumors & Legends: [[Asper]] convinced [[Paraster Montheir]] that Maerilee's scars were Mirt's doing, and that he'd lashed his maid over a debt.
